recommendations.title: The Sharpshooting Solution
recommendations.description: Counter long-range threats and control the map with Piper! Her precision shots and agile Super make her a great fit to cover your current lineup's weaknesses.
tips: Use Super for escapes or aggressive repositioning.

recommendations.title: The Meta Tank
recommendations.description: Dominate objective modes with Frank! His massive health pool and game-changing Super fit the current meta perfectly and complement your aggressive style.
tips: Time your Super carefully as it can be interrupted.
Use your range to hit multiple targets.

recommendations.title: The Master of Area Denial
recommendations.description: Control the battlefield with Sprout! His wall-creating Super and bouncing projectiles offer unique strategic advantages, especially for objective control.
tips: Use walls to funnel enemies or protect teammates.
Master the bounce shots for tricky hits.

summaryMessage: These brawlers could help you conquer new challenges and master the meta!
